alert.note: Alert for Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:47PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cherry County through 415 PM MDT... At 347 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Merriman, or 22 miles south of Martin, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cody, Merriman, Highway 61 Crossing The Niobrara River, Intersection of Highway 61 and Shadbolt Road, Cody Lake and Eli. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 near mile marker 123, and between mile markers 129 and 166. Highway 61 between mile markers 205 and 231. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
